relation: LaGuardia has a cafeteria in every one of its four buildings, giving you a wide variety of choices. If that doesn't satisfy you, the neighborhood is filled with halal stands, breakfast stands, delis, a pizzeria, a 7-11, you name it. Food literally surrounds Laguardia.
There are no dorms. Since it won't let me give zero stars, imagine that one star there, well, isn't there.

If you're majoring in Criminology or Criminal Justice, ask about the CUNY Justice Academy, a program all the CUNY community colleges participate in. If you qualify, it guarantees you a seat in CUNY John Jay, a world leader in studies of law, Criminal justice, law enforcement and Forensics.
LaGuardia offers a rich environment where one is bound to find like-minded peers. I have enjoyed my first 2 months here and enjoy my classes. This is a college for you.
pageTitle: CUNY LaGuardia Community College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {221993=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 203447=LaGuardia is known for it's competitive nursing/ health sciences programs. Academically challenging for Health Sciences Majors (Nursing, occupational therapy, physical therapy, EMT, Radiology, etc.) and Math/Science Majors. The short sessions January-February and July-August offer intensive course work which can help you graduate at a reasonable time, however academically rigorous., 37038=They failed 44 students out of a graduating class of approximately 65 students in the spring of 2010. The nursing department will do whatever it takes to get government funding for their program dept, and that includes failing students. They call anyone that speaks up about their unfair practices, disgruntled.}

textAfterTable: Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus i'm not aware of any unusual traditions or locations that are part of laguardia community college. i have completed a semester and a half. i hope that the more i get to know my surroundings the more i'll learn about the history of this college. Bang for the buck laguardia community college's unique semesters system save you money. they have a mini-session that lasts six weeks. if you have registered for the previous 12-week semester, then this mini-session is free. if stretches your money and helps you to graduate faster. What to do for fun i'm a non-traditional student so my opportunities for extracurricular activities are limited. laguardia community college offers lots of opportunities for fun. there is theater shows, and other activities that happens monthly on campus. Food and Dining i have visited the cafeteria on numerous occasions since it is very convenient. the prices are reasonable. the menu offers breakfast, lunch and even dinner. the food is actually very good. Academic Rigor i found the classes challenging and stimulating. you really need to apply yourself. you have to read your textbook and even do outside
